summary: Jen Kirkman's original comedy special delivers some sharp, hilarious truths about life at 40 as filmed at the North Door in Austin, Texas.
cast: Kelly Patton|Wilder S. Patton|Carol Hickey|Fermin Navar|Derek Babb|Rebecca Chulew|Jason Elinoff|Jessica Isam|Jen Kirkman
keywords: reference to pubic hair|stand up comedy|tv special|comedian|stand up special
title: Jen Kirkman: I'm Gonna Die Alone (And I Feel Fine)
